RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REDOUTE'S LIGHT was well back, closed the gap on the far turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew clear. A I INITIATIVE was off the pace, moved up from the inside on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch finished well. HALF LIT was unhurried early, a factor on the far turn and had the lead from the four path in mid stretch but was outfinished. DIAMONDBACK set the pace and had a clear lead on the far turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and gave way. FOUR KNIGHTS stalked the early leader but chased on the far turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Half Lit
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, factor far turn, led 4-pah stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: A I Initiative
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, moved up inside far turn, 4-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Redoute's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap far turn, 5-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Four Knights
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, chased far turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Diamondback
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, headed top stretch, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORE was away alertly, a factor on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. SHAKOO MAKOO was off slow, forced the pace on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch held place. EXCEED was in range, raced evenly on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch closed late. ONE MORE RING was in touch, saved ground on the turn, angled out through the stretch and had a late rally. JIBARO was hustled early and had a slim lead on the turn but had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Jibaro
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, slim lead turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Shakoo Makoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, forced pace turn, 3-path stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: One More Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, saved ground turn, angled out stretch, late rally

ENTRY.NAME: Exceed
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 5-path stretch, closed late

ENTRY.NAME: Core
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, 4-path stretch, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS SINCE SEPTEMBER 19, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 2 lbs . Claiming Price $12,500, if for $12,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances)(Limited to 10 Starters) (*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to r un on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRIENNE OF TARTH settled off the pace, trailed the field on the turn and angled outside in mid stretch to get up in time. SPARKLE SAMMY tracked the leaders from the outside and moved up on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was outgunned. SNELL FLICKA was in mid pack, roused from the inside on the turn and finished well in deep stretch. MUSICAL RIDE was unhurried early and had a mild gain on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. MY FINAL TRICK stalked the early leader and was a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch leveled off late. FOREST B was hustled early and had a clear lead on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Snell Flicka
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, roused inside turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: My Final Trick
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 4-path stretch, leveled off late

ENTRY.NAME: Brienne of Tarth
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, trailed turn, angled out stretch, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle Sammy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, moved up turn, 5-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: Forest B
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JARA was unhurried early, took command on the turn and was much the best. SHELLY THE ROCKET stalked the early leader and was a factor on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. SWEET FINALE settled off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for show. PACENZA was in range and roused on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no response. LOUEMMA was in touch and saved ground on the turn but was not a factor. REMEMBEROLDTYMES showed speed from the inside but chased on the turn and dropped back through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberoldtymes
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, chased turn, dropped back stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Jara
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, took command turn, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: Shelly the Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor turn, 4-path stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Louemma
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Willwerth James and Stocker-Parks Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, saved ground turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Pacenza
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, roused turn, 5-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Finale
ENTRY.OWNER: Waxman Isaac and Agostino Mary Lynn
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, mild gain turn, 4-path stretch, up for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 82. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 24600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS SINCE SEPTEMBER 19, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 2 lbs . Claiming Price $12,500, if for $12,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIMBALA tracked the early leader, was a factor on the turn and from the three path at he top of the stretch proved best. STORMING LADY was in touch and moved up on the turn but lacked room in mid stretch and was second best. GREEN GABLES set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and vied to mid stretch but was all out. SIMPLE SOUVENIR was off the pace and trailed the field on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch needed more. SNEAKY REBEL was in range early but lost ground on the turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Gimbala
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, factor turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Green Gables
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, vied stretch, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Sneaky Rebel
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range early, lost ground turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Storming Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, moved up turn, lacked room stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Souvenir
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, trailed turn, 5-path stretch, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 19. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Wher e Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRUMLIN BIRD was unhurried early, saved ground on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch rallied in time. FRERET stalked the early leader, dueled on the turn and had the lead from the three path in mid stretch but was caught late. BABY MO set a pressured pace, had a slim lead on the turn, vied through the stretch and held show. HASN'T HIT ME YET was up close and raced evenly on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. MS. P'S BELLA was in range and had a mild gain on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. SILVER TUNES was hustled early and had a good position on the turn but faded late. BETTABE SWIFT was off slow and showed little in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, good position turn, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Bettabe Swift
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed little, dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Crumlin Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, saved ground turn, 3-path stretch, rallied in time

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. P's Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, mild gain turn, 5-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, slim lead turn, vied stretch, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Hasn't Hit Me Yet
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Freret
ENTRY.OWNER: Fournier Mark Zaniol Dean Burwell Dan Langelaan Casey F Romaniuk Jason Gardiner
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, dueled turn, led 3-path stretch, caught late
